channel.title: Gateway freezing [Partially Solved]
channel.description:
It first froze up during an update/dist-upgrade. Before freezing it hit 100% of the allocated RAM, so I upped the ram to 1000. After running for a while it froze again, so I tried 2500, and it still freezes.
I tried re-installing my host OS and the Whonix VMs, but it still happens, and only with the gateway.
I'm now trying running it at 192 RAM without GUI. It's been running for 10 minutes so far without freezing, so maybe it works, but I would prefer to use a desktop environment.
Does anyone know how to fix this?
EDIT: I've been running it at 192 RAM without GUI since I made this thread, and it has not frozen once. If anyone else is having this problem this might also fix it for you.
